verses.roman:
ei-mata tina-dina prayāge rahilā
kṛṣṇa-nāma-prema diyā loka nistārilā

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; tina-dina—for three days; prayāge—at Prayāga; rahilā—remained; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; prema—and ecstatic love; diyā—delivering; loka nistārilā—delivered the people.
translation: The Lord stayed at Prayāga for three days. He delivered the holy name of Kṛṣṇa and ecstatic love. Thus He delivered many people.
